title: Integrate Dashboard with SQLite Database
description: The current dashboard generator reads from outdated and incomplete JSON files. It needs to be refactored to read directly from the `ai_lab.db` SQLite database to provide an accurate and real-time view of the project's status.
acceptance_criteria: The `dashboard_generator.py` script is refactored to connect to the `ai_lab.db` SQLite database using SQLAlchemy.
The dashboard accurately displays the total number of projects, ideas, and work items from the database.
The dashboard metrics (e.g., completion rates) are calculated based on the live data from the database.
The 'Recent Activity' section on the dashboard shows the latest entries from the database.
The dashboard provides a true and reliable overview of the project's status.

sub_tasks.title: Implement database connection in dashboard generator
Refactor metric calculation to use database data
Update dashboard template to display database data

notes: This is a critical step to make the dashboard a reliable tool for project monitoring.
